entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to install .NET 8 SDK on Alpine following official instructions #37790

Closed

  • Error message for `dotnet workload` is an exception #32620
    .NET 8.0
  • Multi-version dotnet tool installed #27050

PullRequests

Created

  • Include MSBuild version as part of --info, not every build. #37804
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (7.0) #37794
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for Blazor webassembly projects (6.0) #37793
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Wasm] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for wasm projects #37791
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #37782
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Added test for .user file in outer build #37192
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add dotnet-format to the SDK repo #37717
    Area-Format
